QuestData.Title: All or Nothing
QuestData.Description: This is it.$b$bThis is where we make our stand.$b$bWe must defend this ship to our last breath, and make these cretins think twice before approaching it again!$b$bMay our blades strike fear in their hearts!
QuestData.LogDescription: Assist Captain Taylor in the defense of The Briny Cutter.
QuestData.RewardText: The Earthen Ring has received my distress message and sent help - just in time it would seem.$b$bHopefully more can be sent soon. We are but few against a great many.

Objectives.Objective: Defense of The Briny Cutter Complete
